name: Hummingbird Cake
author: Maris Elizabeth
instructions: Combine flour, sugar, baking soda, and cinnamon. Add eggs and oil. Stir until moist. Do not beat. Stir in vanilla, pineapple, bananas and 1 cup nuts. Bake in 3 greased and floured 9 inch cake pans at 350Â° for 25 to 30 minutes. Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pans and cool completely. Frost with cream cheese frosting.
